conclusion: Remainder inadmissible;Violation of Art. 3 (substantive aspect);Violation of Art. 5-1;Violation of Art. 5-3;No violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of Art. 13;No violation of Art. 13;Non-pecuniary damage - award
